code: import React from'react';import EventCard from'../components/EventCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FavoritesScreen=_ref=>{let{isLoggedIn,setShowLoginModal,events,favoriteEvents,setFavoriteEvents}=_ref;const favoriteEventsList=events.filter(event=>favoriteEvents.has(event.id));const toggleFavoriteEvent=eventId=>{const newFavoriteEvents=new Set(favoriteEvents);if(newFavoriteEvents.has(eventId)){newFavoriteEvents.delete(eventId);}else{newFavoriteEvents.add(eventId);}setFavoriteEvents(newFavoriteEvents);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"screen-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"page-title",children:"Favorite Events"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"events-container",children:!isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"empty-state",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"empty-state-icon",children:"\u2764\uFE0F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"empty-state-title",children:"Login to save favorites"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"empty-state-text",children:"Sign up to save your favorite events!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"change-location-button",onClick:()=>setShowLoginModal(true),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"change-location-button-text",children:"Sign Up / Log In"})})]}):favoriteEventsList.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"empty-state",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"empty-state-icon",children:"\u2764\uFE0F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"empty-state-title",children:"No favorite events yet"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"empty-state-text",children:"Heart the events you love!"})]}):favoriteEventsList.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EventCard,{event:event,favoriteEvents:favoriteEvents,toggleFavoriteEvent:toggleFavoriteEvent},event.id))})]});};export default FavoritesScreen;
